communications.subject: Illinois Freedom of Information Act. Request: ALPR audit (Sangamon County Sheriff’s Office)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

Concerning Flock Safety, these files;

1. Organization Audit in Flock.
The report should include data logged from the period of January 1, 2025, to the date this request is processed. Per Flock's documentation, the Organization Audit is available within the Insights tab and is defined as searches done within the agency.

2. Network Audit in Flock.
The report should include data logged from the period of January 1, 2025, to the date this request is processed. Per Flock's documentation, the Network Audit is available within the Insights tab and is defined as searches of the organization’s Flock network by any agency in the Flock System.

3. A list of network share settings that include:
3a. Flock networks shared with me;
3b. Networks that I’m sharing.

Please provide records in their original electronic, machine readable format. For example, please provide csv or spreadsheet files where applicable.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Scott Kampas

communications.subject: Welcome to the Records Request Center!
communications.communication:
Dear Scott Kampas, 
 
Thank you for registering with the Public Records Request Center. 
 
Your Login ID is:  191442-42331705@requests.muckrock.com 
 
If you did not submit your request through the public portal but are receiving this e-mail, an account has been created for you where you can track and monitor the status of your request, and receive any documents in response to your request.

communications.subject: Sheriff's Office FOIA Request :: R005304-081825
communications.communication:
Dear Scott Kampas: 
Your request has been received and is being processed. Your request was received in this office on 8/18/2025 and given the reference number R005304-081825 for tracking purposes. 
 Records Requested: To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

Concerning Flock Safety, these files;

1. Organization Audit in Flock.
The report should include data logged from the period of January 1, 2025, to the date this request is processed. Per Flock's documentation, the Organization Audit is available within the Insights tab and is defined as searches done within the agency.

2. Network Audit in Flock.
The report should include data logged from the period of January 1, 2025, to the date this request is processed. Per Flock's documentation, the Network Audit is available within the Insights tab and is defined as searches of the organization’s Flock network by any agency in the Flock System.

3. A list of network share settings that include:
3a. Flock networks shared with me;
3b. Networks that I’m sharing.

Please provide records in their original electronic, machine readable format. For example, please provide csv or spreadsheet files where applicable.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Scott Kampas 
Your request will be forwarded to the relevant department(s) to locate the information you seek and to determine the volume and any costs associated with satisfying your request. You will be contacted about the availability and/or provided with copies of the records in question. 
You can monitor the progress of your request at the link below and you'll receive an email when your request has been completed. 
 
Sangamon County Sheriff's Office 
 
To monitor the progress or update this request please log into the FOIA Center (https://u8387778.ct.sendgrid.net/ls/click?upn=u001.VEsWrlMiJDg0mXafq1mEXVm5Gegs1cB0W5SlAvkNxwY1TvAcpIFVRfOXNv83HpYTSmzQKqkdnNDTiLosIYc3hOgN7DUr5wUOGEqlnEN4nuA-3Dl0pM_85k-2FGhQDcbSVbSDAGUGAjJbBi5HB28d8VxHLH2t9rOtk4fgRUAVULg9q7BMCAdSX0nZ4Xwv2yO6XEw6FmwCbIb902qQFmV5wiIcuSNV2dJBntmTSVLkayYLfM4kgy5cUIRB0LLzJSmVgfvBo4tGpnQyrfvju8EUCELYTpeqNKQzGMf-2Ftf9I8NGwPUYOKjkhIzZHkdjGXAUECpog0Kd553VmBzgf6oJ-2F2aC4VWkbXUo8-3D)
